definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yi2 dong4 Tong1 xin4

definition: moving average index (used in financial analysis)
pinyin: yi2 dong4 ping2 jun1 xian4 zhi3 biao1
yi2 dong4 tong1 xin4 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: Immediate turn right 90 degrees, fast moving target at 12 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 立即右轉90度快速移動目標在正前方。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: EA brings MONOPOLY's new card game to mobile.
sentences.chinese: 電子藝界壟斷帶來的新遊戲移動。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短間隔移動。

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，佛坪大熊貓有季節性垂直移動習性。

sentences.english: Touch and move trigger of catapult and see changes of power.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸和移動觸發彈射器，看到力的轉變。

sentences.english: Imagine a tick-tack-toe grid in your viewfinder.
sentences.chinese: 想象取景器中一點一點移動的柵格。

sentences.english: The two switch regions move the most.
sentences.chinese: 連個轉變區移動地最多。

sentences.english: You can select and move multiple artifacts in this manner.
sentences.chinese: 您可以按照這種方式選擇並移動多個工件。

sentences.english: And, that radius rotates around the wheel as the wheel is moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 這條半徑隨着車輪的向前移動在旋轉着。

sentences.english: Keep legs straight and move thighs back.
sentences.chinese: 保持雙腿伸直，大腿向後方移動。

sentences.english: Expect to see more AI-based mobile technology quite soon.
sentences.chinese: 現在可以期待很快能看見更多的基於AI的移動技術。

sentences.english: Don't pull a vacuum on the exchanger.
sentences.chinese: 不要移動熱交換器上的真空設備。

sentences.english: When you fly over a primitive, an information icon appears.
sentences.chinese: 移動到一個原語上時，顯示信息圖標。

sentences.english: The equipment shall be small, cheap, simple and transportable.
sentences.chinese: 設備應小，便宜，簡單，可移動。

sentences.english: The unusually big suspension allows the woofer to perform big membrane movements.
sentences.chinese: 這種罕有的大懸浮設計使低音能夠執行大膜移動。

definition: to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
